about_the_game:
🔮 Logic Town - House of Terror DLC 🎃

Enter if you dare! "House of Terror" is the spookiest DLC yet for Logic Town, turning the peaceful puzzle-solving you've come to know on its head. Meet Mortimer, the frog groundskeeper with a mysterious past, as you embark on a spine-chilling journey to transform a perfectly pristine house into a creepy, haunted mansion. Your ultimate goal? Summon an ancient tentacle monster from another dimension… but first, there’s some paranormal prep work to do!

Key Features:

🐸 Meet Mortimer, the Frog Groundskeeper: Mortimer may look harmless, but this croaky caretaker has a few ghostly tricks up his sleeve. Tasked with overseeing the mansion, he needs your help to make it more... otherworldly. Join him in bringing a haunted flair to this once immaculate home.

🏚️ Reverse the Natural Order: Unlike previous Logic Town chapters, you’ll start with a picture-perfect house and get to work destroying it! Break windows, tear up the flower beds, summon spirits, and turn this dream home into a nightmare — all to prepare for the arrival of a fearsome creature beyond comprehension!

🧩 Several new puzzle themes that remix existing icons with 6 brand new categories:

  • The Coven: Unravel the secrets of an ancient witch coven and cast powerful spells upon the hapless denizens of puzzleton.

  • No Rest for the Dead: Tap into the spirit world and hunt down the ghosts plaguing Logic Town.

  • Candy or Chaos: It’s Halloween, and trick-or-treaters are on the loose in Logic Town! Can you keep up with the spooky fun?

🍬Get your heart pounding this Halloween with the spooky new Free Play Puzzle Theme — and climb to the top of the haunted leaderboards! 👻
